snippet.title: Mini Golf Resort (DS) Trailer by Teyon
snippet.description:
The ultimate minigolf experience!

Welcome to the most amazing minigolf resort ever on Nintendo DS! Grab your golf clubs and get ready to play through 56 incredible courses in 4 unique worlds. Enjoy a combination of real golf club rules and wacky minigolf fun as you shoot your ball through pipes, up extreme ramps and around crazy obstacles towards the hole!

With over 1001 fun and challenging courses available, packed with eye-catching graphics and easy controls, it's the ultimate minigolf experience!

Features:

- Over 1001 holes on 56 courses
- Intuitive and realistic 3D virtual play engine
- 4 distinct worlds: Pirate's Bay, Spooky World, Pyramids of Egypt and Legends of Greece - A large selection of clubs, clothes and bonuses in the golf shop 
- 10 player trophies and 8 special power-up bonuses
- Full character customization
- Multi-player for up to 6 players

Developer: Teyon
Publisher: Tivola

www.teyon.com
www.tivola.com

Copyright 2010 Selectsoft Publishing. All rights reserved.
